venues.name: Modern Art Gallery
venues.description: A cutting-edge gallery featuring contemporary artists from around the world. Known for its innovative installations and multimedia exhibitions.

venues.name: Natural History Museum
venues.description: Explore millions of years of natural history through interactive exhibits, dinosaur fossils, and geological wonders.

venues.name: Classical Art Museum
venues.description: Home to an extensive collection of European masterpieces from the Renaissance to the 19th century.

venues.name: Photography Gallery
venues.description: Showcasing both historic and contemporary photography, featuring rotating exhibitions from renowned photographers.

venues.name: Science & Technology Museum
venues.description: Interactive exhibits demonstrating scientific principles and technological advances through hands-on experiences.

venues.name: Contemporary Sculpture Garden
venues.description: An outdoor museum featuring large-scale contemporary sculptures set in beautiful landscaped gardens.
